mapper.select: SELECT sn, category, name, user_id, picture, description, attend_count, rating, rating_count, sido, sigungu, status, reg_date, upd_date from tgrp where user_id = #{id} and status != 'GRST03' order by sn desc

select t.sn, t.category, t.name, t.picture, t.description, t.attend_count, t.rating, t.rating_count, t.sido, t.sigungu, t.status, t.reg_user_id, t.reg_date, t.reg_user_id from Tgrp_list l LEFT OUTER JOIN tgrp t ON l.grp_sn = t.sn AND l.user_id = #{id} AND t.status = 'GRST01' AND l.status = 'GRUS01' where t.user_id != #{id} order by t.sn desc

select t.sn, t.category, t.name, t.picture, t.description, t.attend_count, t.rating, t.rating_count, t.sido, t.sigungu, t.status, t.reg_user_id, t.reg_date, t.reg_user_id from tgrp_wish l LEFT OUTER JOIN tgrp t ON l.grp_sn = t.sn AND t.status = 'GRST01' where l.user_id = #{id} order by t.sn desc
